active_skill.name: Closer, Closer...
active_skill.description:
Unleashes a series of slashes with dual blades, dealing Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier: 540%/576%/612%/648%/684%

Daze Multiplier: 316.5%/337.6%/358.7%/379.8%/400.8%

Cooldown 18s

additional_ability.name: Swiftly Honed
additional_ability.description: When there is at least 1 Attack character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 30%/37.5%/45%/52.5%/60%.

chain_attack.name: That's Close Enough!
chain_attack.description:
Continually slashes the target, dealing massive Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier: 1146%/1222.4%/1298.8%/1375.2%/1451.6%

Daze Multiplier: 163.5%/174.4%/185.3%/196.2%/207.1%
